story.text: The [[Astronomers Proposal Tool]] is a [[Java Language]] application which allows astronomers to consider the scientific feasability of a particular set of observations and/or to plan how those observations are executed. The tool is currently designed to work on the [[Hubble Space Telescope]], but could be adapted to work on other telescopes or even multiple telescopes.
For more information, please consult the project Web page at [http://ra.stsci.edu/apst/apt/ ra.stsci.edu].

The [[Astronomers Proposal Tool]] is a [[Java Language]] application which allows astronomers to consider the scientific feasability of a particular set of observations and/or to plan how those observations are executed. The tool is currently designed to work on the [[Hubble Space Telescope]], but could be adapted to work on other telescopes or even multiple telescopes.
For more information, please consult the project Web page at [http://ra.stsci.edu/apst/apt/ ra.stsci.edu].
